features: ★ STRONG 10X MAGNIFICATION: See more than you ever thought possible with this powerful 10X MAGNIFYING MIRROR. You'll LOVE THE EXTREME CLARITY of your DUAL-SIDED 10X/1X magnifying mirror that lets you SEE EVERY DETAIL UP CLOSE EVEN WITHOUT GLASSES! ***The central focal area on the 10x magnifying side is concave and reflection quality may diminish as you move away from the center.***

★ PERFECT SIZE AND HEIGHT: This mirror is 35 CM TALL, 18 CM WIDE and comes with a HEAVY PADDED BASE preventing countertop scratches or accidental knock over. Meet your new MAKEUP COMPANION FOR doing lashes, eyebrows, plucking, tweezing or putting on contacts!

★ TIMELESS CLASSIC CHROME LOOK: This classic mirror that started it all will never go out of style! Classy chrome mirrors can give your DRESSING TABLE, BATHROOM COUNTERTOP, DESK and MAKEUP VANITY a visual upgrade. Let's face it, a beautiful mirror makes your room more beautiful.

★ A GIFT YOUR SISTER, MOTHER, DAUGHTER, (GIRL)FRIEND WILL LOVE: You've got the right idea if you're thinking about giving a mirror as a gift. But you want to give something CLASSY, WELL MADE and reflects your GREAT TASTE. That's why your mirror comes BEAUTIFULLY PACKAGED in an ELEGANT WHITE GIFT BOX for that extra WOW factor!

★ "NIRVANA WITH MIRRORVANA" EXPERIENCE: We think you DESERVE THE BEST and we also think you'll agree THIS MIRROR IS WORTH EVERY PENNY. But in the event you're not COMPLETE SATISFIED, we will replace or refund every last penny. No jumping through hoops, no lame excuses, no hassle. We just want you to be in COMPLETE NIRVANA with Mirrorvana, okay?
